description.raw:
* This PR implements the test of gazebo packages directly from the Ubuntu repositories without using any of our repositories.

    The test includes a quick runtime run to detect major problems. The problem with the ignition URL change \(reported originally by @{557058:e2bf789f-2138-4a4e-ba39-3d618078e20b} \) appears [in the build log](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64/8/parsed_console).



    Testing:



    * The official Ubuntu packages:
    
        ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64&build=8)
    
        [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install\_ubuntu\_official-gazebo9\_pkg-bionic-amd64/8/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64/8/)

    
    * gazebo9 from our repositories:
    
        ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-install-gazebo9_pkg-xenial-amd64&build=525)
    
        [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install-gazebo9\_pkg-xenial-amd64/525/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install-gazebo9_pkg-xenial-amd64/525/)
description.html:
• This PR implements the test of gazebo packages directly from the Ubuntu repositories without using any of our repositories.

    The test includes a quick runtime run to detect major problems. The problem with the ignition URL change (reported originally by @Tully Foote ) appears in the build log.

    Testing:

    • The official Ubuntu packages:

      https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64/8/

    • gazebo9 from our repositories:

      https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install-gazebo9_pkg-xenial-amd64/525/

    The test includes a quick runtime run to detect major problems. The problem with the ignition URL change \(reported originally by @{557058:e2bf789f-2138-4a4e-ba39-3d618078e20b} \) appears [in the build log](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64/8/parsed_console).

title: Testing official Ubuntu packages

summary.raw:
* This PR implements the test of gazebo packages directly from the Ubuntu repositories without using any of our repositories.

    The test includes a quick runtime run to detect major problems. The problem with the ignition URL change \(reported originally by @{557058:e2bf789f-2138-4a4e-ba39-3d618078e20b} \) appears [in the build log](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64/8/parsed_console).



    Testing:



    * The official Ubuntu packages:
    
        ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64&build=8)
    
        [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install\_ubuntu\_official-gazebo9\_pkg-bionic-amd64/8/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64/8/)

    
    * gazebo9 from our repositories:
    
        ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-install-gazebo9_pkg-xenial-amd64&build=525)
    
        [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install-gazebo9\_pkg-xenial-amd64/525/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-install-gazebo9_pkg-xenial-amd64/525/)
